body_html:
To be clear, the fix is good for me, but I figured a related discussion on selective pooling (whether to ditch NaN values or anything you want to ignore) could happen (maybe not on this issue ?)

It would be convenient for my use case, but maybe for others too.

body:
To be clear, the fix is good for me, but I figured a related discussion on selective pooling (whether to ditch NaN values or anything you want to ignore) could happen (maybe not on this issue ?)

It would be convenient for my use case, but maybe for others too.
